thread.title: Hayes crash: Man fighting for life after being hit by car on Uxbridge Road
thread.title_full: Hayes crash: Man fighting for life after being hit by car on Uxbridge Road

author: Patrick Grafton-Green
title: Hayes crash: Man fighting for life after being hit by car on Uxbridge Road
text:
Monday 16 January 2017 21:40 BST Click to followThe Evening Standard A pensioner has been rushed to hospital in a critical condition after the crash on Uxbridge Road Google Street View 
A Man is fighting for life after he was hit by a car on a busy road in Hayes . 
A section of Uxbridge Road was closed for hours following the collision at the junction with Coldharbour Lane shortly before 6.30pm on Monday. 
Paramedics from the London Amulance Service treated the man at the scene and he has been rushed to a west London hospital in a critical condition. 
A Met Police spokesman said the driver stopped at the scene and has not been arrested. 
Bus routes 195, 207, 427, 607 and E8 were put on diversion. More about:
